category-def.name: GENIVI CommonAPI
category-def.label: GENIVI CommonAPI Generators
category-def.description: The basic generator for all CommonAPI compliant middle ware libraries. Creates all source code that needs to adhere the specification. Any specific middle ware code is generated by separate generators, in separate files.

category-def.name: GENIVI CommonAPI Console
category-def.label: GENIVI CommonAPI Console Generators
category-def.description: The basic console generator for all CommonAPI compliant middleware libraries. Creates all source code that needs to adhere the specification. Any specific middleware code is generated by seperate generators, in seperate files.
